entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:15 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early in the afternoon except rain along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 130 along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:15 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 8 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 140 along parts of the coast in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to 8 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:15 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
